title: Credit Card 24h
body: Heya, so I got some money today and decided to get them sweet snow capsules, but when I entered my mastercard data it kept saying "payment declined by the card provider". I kept on trying and it then proccedeed to ban me from using the card for 24h. Any help? :/

replies.body: Heya, you may need to reach out to your provider and see if it might be blocking online transactions or something similar.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just in case so our billing team can take a look and if there's any errors coming on our side.
